description: A collection of circles in a sideways teardrop-shaped formation with the point on the left side; there is a triangular formation with a very rounded top extending upwards from the top right of the teardrop-shaped formation. Each circle has a different number in the center denoting how many lines stem from that point. There is an orange triangle on the left side of the teardrop-shaped formation and another orange triangle on the right.

author.name: VertexArchive
author.description: An UNOFFICIAL archive of the New York Times' Vertex puzzle. This account is not affiliated with the NY Times. I just like the triangles.
